message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start with a price of $150.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product is important to you, but I believe I can find a fair price closer to my valuation. How about $130?
I understand you're looking for a fair price, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $142 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget and the value I place on the product, I propose a price of $135.
I'm getting closer to your valuation, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $140, but I need to make a profit, so that's the best I can do.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $138 for the product.
I'm glad we're close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need $139 for the product. That's as low as I can go.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering our previous negotiations, I am willing to pay $137 for the product.
I'm getting a bit frustrated, Bob. I've already compromised a lot. I'm willing to meet you at $138, but I'm not going any lower than that.
